Diagram Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from AbstractDiagram. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Clean Up DiagramReroutes all existing wires and reorders all existing objects on the block diagram. Details
Create from Data TypeCreates a control or constant of the data type you specify. LabVIEW always creates a control initially. To change the type of the new object, use the Change to Indicator method. Details
Default Diagram Clean Up OptionsReturns the default values for automatically cleaning up the block diagram. Details
